text:
bought my bike from carousell, went in for the new OBU installation as well as a full check up.

the boss and mechanics were welcoming and transparent about what was required to be replaced, even though i came at peak lunch hour while everyone was preoccupied.

fuss free and earnest services, got a call to collect after their advised turnover time. will definitely come back for my routine services again.
Serviced my yamaha nmax, changed erp unit. Very friendly, reasonable price and fast service. Will come again.

Worst experience with this shop, they never said the price before fix the crash bar that I purchased outside, If they tell so I won’t fix there also after fixed they asked half of the material price that I bought for the fixing, this boss the lean and short uncle said after if want to bargain don’t come to my shop other shops cannot fix the outside buy one like this, if he told this earlier I won’t fix the thing there, totally worthless shop and sucking blood of other by fixing prices for 15mins job to set the maximum price, day started with loosing money feeling negative after went there

Came to remove old cameras and install new ones. Initially it was quoted $100 for installing cameras, then they increased to $150 when I informed them about removing old cameras as well. The price is unjustified considering it is the same job.
Honest, transparent & polite. My company have been dealing with them for many years & we will continue to support GNG. This is a place where you can buy your dream bike or your bike insurance!
